Html:
Can you add a feature to turn on/off a lat/lng grid like the google earth?

http://matrixgreatescape.files.wordpress.com/2009/02/picture-10.png

I tried using a layer plotting the grids using routes, but I'm having difficulty showing the labels of the lat/lng.

If I uses a blank markers to show the lat/lng (with tooltips), it end up taking up too much resources and take too long to redraw when moving/zooming the map.
the issue is to draw grid only in the current visible area, not for the whole planet, so it should render fast, i'll try my shot on this

Radioman,

Did you make some progress in this feature? Would be very interesting...
